```{r, cache=TRUE}
r_formatting_sucks <- function(n) {
  if(n < 10) {
    return(paste("0", n, sep=""))
  }
  else {
    return(n)
  }
}
getFileName <- function(startYear) {
  R_is_stupid <- paste("ignore/MERGED", startYear, "_", r_formatting_sucks((startYear + 1) %% 100), "_PP.csv", sep="")
  return(R_is_stupid)
}
dataStartYears <- 1996:2014
df = read.csv(getFileName(dataStartYears[1]))
df$startYear = dataStartYears[1]
for (year in dataStartYears[dataStartYears > dataStartYears[1]]){
  tmp <- read.csv(getFileName(year))
  tmp$startYear = year
  df <- rbind(df, tmp)
}
rm(tmp)
unique(df$startYear)
```
